title: 1.12-1 cherry-pick request: Fix TfLiteTensor invalidation issue when using the Java API
body_html:
Fix an issue where the Java Tensor class would hold a reference
to an invalidated TfLiteTensor instance. This issue was manifest
in certain models that add temporary tensors during execution.

PiperOrigin-RevId: 215582842

This CL is critical for 1.12 as there are several clients who were
impacted by the regression in 1.11 and are blocked on a stable fix.

body:
Fix an issue where the Java Tensor class would hold a reference
to an invalidated TfLiteTensor instance. This issue was manifest
in certain models that add temporary tensors during execution.

PiperOrigin-RevId: 215582842

This CL is critical for 1.12 as there are several clients who were
impacted by the regression in 1.11 and are blocked on a stable fix.
